display_long_description:
Prepare for explosive action in BOOM TOWER DEFENSE – the ultimate strategic VR tower defense experience!

Step into a kingdom under siege, where waves of deadly bombs from the ruthless Bomb Kingdom are headed straight for your castle. It’s up to you to defend your land using a powerful army of animated skeleton towers—each ready to hurl weapons, unleash chaos, and stop the enemy in its tracks.

Carefully place your towers across the battlefield, manage your defenses, and use your wits to survive increasingly intense waves of enemies. With every boom, your strategy is put to the test. Will your defenses hold—or will your castle fall?

Featuring explosive combat, charmingly spooky tower units, and a kingdom full of surprises, BOOM TOWER DEFENSE offers a thrilling blend of strategy, timing, and all-out fun.

Defend your kingdom. Stop the bombs. And remember—every boom matters.
